content: but wanted a basic ribbed brimmed hat to keep his head and ears warm while he checks on his cows over on the farm so i whipped out my needles and voila this hat was born we snapped the pictures and then bundled up the hat and sent it off on its way to my pa so there you have it if you love it please pin it tweet it facebook it instagram it ya know if you want chandi you may sell the items you make using my patterns i just ask that you link back to my shop thanks 1 https //www expressionfiberarts com/ 2 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/
